typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EID as short,
		EName as string,
		ESalary as short,
		EAddress as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 derive(Insert_date = currentTimestamp(),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> insertdate
insertdate derive(Amount = ESalary) ~> Amount
Amount sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['DestEmp.txt'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		EID,
		EName,
		ESalary = Amount,
		EAddress,
		Insert_date
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
